DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective propose study determine difference suture time use restorelle Y mesh versus restorelle dual flat mesh time laparoscopic robotic-assisted laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy . Hypothesis : Suturing time use restorelle Y mesh faster use restorelle dual flat mesh time laparoscopic robotic-assisted laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Y Mesh v Dual Mesh
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : Randomized single-blind prospective clinical trial Primary Outcomes : 1 . Total Suturing time mesh placement = time insertion Y mesh first flat mesh arm pelvis last sacral suture place 2 . Total OR time = operating room time entry exit 3 . Total Case time = Incision end closure Secondary Outcomes : 1 . Intraoperative , peri-operative post-operative complication 2 . Hospital cost ( Y mesh v. dual mesh stratify RA LSC v. LSC ) 3 . Post-operative patient outcomes 6 week , 6 month , 12 month , 24-months - Pelvic Organ Prolapse Quantification ( POPQ ) system ( standardized quantification prolapse establish International Continence Society ) - Pelvic Floor Dysfunction Inventory ( PFDI-20 ) Study Population : Study subject recruit patient present Center Urogynecology Pelvic Floor Disorders Department Obstetrics Gynecology Cleveland Clinic main campus , Hillcrest Hospital Fairview Hospital , surgeries perform either one site . Study Procedures : Study Identification Recruitment Potential subject identify member Center Urogynecology Pelvic Reconstructive Surgery Cleveland Clinic main campus Fairview Hospital . Eligible patient agree participate provide write informed consent administer collaborator list IRB Cleveland Clinic main campus Fairview Hospital . Randomization All subject predetermine surgeon undergo either laparoscopic robotic assist laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy depend upon clinical evaluation . The participant randomize either Y mesh dual flat mesh sacrocolpopexy accord computer-generated randomization schedule random block size use SAS statistical software package ( SAS Institute , Cary , NC ) . Randomization carry provider . All patient blind assignment . Office Interventions In addition standardize evaluation include history physical examination , patient ask complete Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory ( PFDI-20 ) questionnaire pre-operative visit well 6 , 12 24-month postoperative visit . Completion questionnaire additional assessment specific participation study usually include part standard care sacrocolpopexy . It take 10-15 minute complete questionnaire . The study subject expose additional risk participate study except inconvenience complete questionnaire . Surgical Interventions Laparoscopic sacrocolpopexy perform use four port : umbilical port laparoscope , two port ( either 5 10/12 mm ) bilateral lower quadrant , one 5-mm port place level umbilicus , lateral rectus muscle either side retraction . The robotic-assisted hysterectomy perform use da Vinci Surgical System ( Intuitive Surgical Inc. , Sunnyvale , CA , USA ) use five port : 12mm umbilical port laparoscopic , two 8 mm robotic port place 2cm inferior 9-10cm lateral umbilicus bilaterally , 8mm robotic port place left axillary line level umbilicus , 8mm 10/12mm accessory port either right upper quadrant approximately 3cm distal costal margin , right low quadrant , 2cm medial anterior superior iliac spine . If supracervical hysterectomy perform , do standard fashion . A uterine manipulator place inside uterus . The round ligament transect use cautery . The fallopian tube ovary leave situ removed time hysterectomy depend upon preoperative decision make surgeon patient . The uterine artery cardinal ligament cauterize laparoscopically . The uterus amputated level internal cervical o endocervical canal cauterize . The sacrocolpopexy also perform standard fashion . An end-to-end anastomosis ( EEA ) sizer place vagina manipulation apex well rectum delineation rectovaginal septum . First , presacral dissection perform longitudinal peritoneal incision sacral promontory identification anterior longitudinal ligament . Dissection do caudally peritoneum subperitoneal fat level posterior cul-de-sac . The vagina elevate cephalad use EEA sizer peritoneum overlie anterior vaginal apex incise transversely , bladder dissect anterior vagina use sharp dissection , create 4 5 cm pocket . If plane difficult establish , bladder fill retrograde fashion find correct dissection plane . Similarly , peritoneum overlie posterior vagina incise , dissection do overlie vagina extend posterior cul-de-sac , create 4 5 cm pocket . Once dissection complete , mesh graft prepare . Subjects randomize either one two mesh graft : 1 . Restorelle Y mesh - The mesh introduce pelvis one port . - First , either anterior posterior arm fix anterior posterior vaginal wall use 5 delayed- absorbable ( PDS ) No . 2-0 suture interrupt fashion , 1 2 cm apart . - The oppose arm graft attach either anterior posterior vaginal wall , depend arm place first , similar fashion use 5 delayed- absorbable ( PDS ) No . 2-0 suture interrupt fashion , 1 2 cm apart . - The stem portion graft bring sacral promontory suture anterior longitudinal ligament use 2 permanent ( prolene ) No . 0 suture . The excess mesh trim . 2 . Restorelle dual flat mesh : 2 piece 15 x 4 cm mesh - One mesh arm introduce pelvis one port . - The arm fix anterior posterior vaginal wall use 5 delayed- absorbable ( PDS ) No . 2-0 suture interrupt fashion , 1 2 cm apart . - The second mesh arm introduce pelvis one port . - The arm fix either anterior posterior vaginal wall , depend first arm place , use 5 delayed- absorbable ( PDS ) No . 2-0 suture interrupt fashion , 1 2 cm apart . - The two arm bring sacral promontory suture together anterior longitudinal ligament use 2 permanent ( prolene ) No . 0 suture . The excess mesh trim . The peritoneum close expose graft absorbable suture . Routine cystoscopy also perform order ass low urinary tract injury . A vaginal exam perform , anterior and/or posterior colporrhaphy perineorrhaphy perform need . Anti-incontinence procedure may also perform need . **In laparoscopic case , suture do extracorporeally intracorporeal knot-tying technique perform robot assist laparoscopic case .

Inability comprehend write and/or spoken English Inability provide inform consent Medical illness preclude laparoscopy Need concomitant surgery relate pelvic organ prolapse incontinence Sacrocolpoperineopexy
